Suffer the Foe.flavor: The wrath of Bane flows through your weapon, sapping your enemyâ€™s perseverance.
Suffer the Foe.onHit: 2[W] damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Fell the Foe.name: Fell the Foe
Fell the Foe.flavor: You lash out with impossible speed, knocking the foe from his feet.
Fell the Foe.trigger: You hit and deal damage with an opportunity attack.
Fell the Foe.effect: The attack knocks the foe prone, in addition to its normal effects. Until the end of your next turn, if the opponent attempts to stand, it provokes an opportunity attack from you if you are adjacent to the target.

Indomitable Assault.name: Indomitable Assault
Indomitable Assault.flavor: The faltering of your foe grants you added strength and speed.
Indomitable Assault.effect: After resolving the attack, move up to your speed and make a secondary attack against a different target in reach.
Indomitable Assault.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Indomitable Assault.special: If your primary attack with this power reduced the target to 0 hit points or fewer, a hit with this secondary attack deals 4[W] damage on a hit instead.
